00035 MergeScanner::MergeScanner(ScanContextPtr &scanContextPtr, bool returnDeletes) : CellListScanner(scanContextPtr), m_done(false), m_initialized(false), m_scanners(), m_queue(), m_delete_present(false), m_deleted_row(0), m_deleted_column_family(0), m_deleted_cell(0), m_return_deletes(returnDeletes), m_row_count(0), m_row_limit(0), m_cell_count(0), m_cell_limit(0), m_cell_cutoff(0), m_prev_key(0) {
00036   if (scanContextPtr->spec != 0)
00037     m_row_limit = scanContextPtr->spec->row_limit;
00038   m_start_timestamp = scanContextPtr->interval.first;
00039   m_end_timestamp = scanContextPtr->interval.second;
00040 }

00044 void MergeScanner::add_scanner(CellListScanner *scanner) {
00045   m_scanners.push_back(scanner);

00050 MergeScanner::~MergeScanner() {
00051   for (size_t i=0; i<m_scanners.size(); i++)
00052     delete m_scanners[i];
00053   if (m_release_callback)
00054     m_release_callback();
00055 }

00059 void MergeScanner::forward() {
00060   ScannerStateT sstate;
00061   Key keyComps;
00062   size_t len;
00063 
00064   if (m_queue.empty())
00065     return;
00066 
00067   sstate = m_queue.top();
00068 
00073   while (true) {
00074 
00075     while (true) {
00076 
00077       m_queue.pop();
00078       sstate.scanner->forward();
00079       if (sstate.scanner->get(sstate.key, sstate.value))
00080         m_queue.push(sstate);
00081 
00082       if (m_queue.empty())
00083         return;
00084 
00085       sstate = m_queue.top();
00086 
00087       if (!keyComps.load(sstate.key)) {
00088         HT_ERROR("Problem decoding key!");
00089       }
00090       else if (keyComps.timestamp < m_start_timestamp) {
00091         continue;
00092       }
00093       else if (keyComps.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW) {
00094         len = strlen(keyComps.row) + 1;
00095         if (m_delete_present && m_deleted_row.fill() == len && !memcmp(m_deleted_row.base, keyComps.row, len)) {
00096           if (m_deleted_row_timestamp < keyComps.timestamp)
00097             m_deleted_row_timestamp = keyComps.timestamp;
00098         }
00099         else {
00100           m_deleted_row.clear();
00101           m_deleted_row.ensure(len);
00102           memcpy(m_deleted_row.base, keyComps.row, len);
00103           m_deleted_row.ptr = m_deleted_row.base + len;
00104           m_deleted_row_timestamp = keyComps.timestamp;
00105           m_delete_present = true;
00106         }
00107         if (m_return_deletes)
00108           break;
00109       }
00110       else if (keyComps.flag == FLAG_DELETE_COLUMN_FAMILY) {
00111         len = keyComps.column_qualifier - keyComps.row;
00112         if (m_delete_present && m_deleted_column_family.fill() == len && !memcmp(m_deleted_column_family.base, keyComps.row, len)) {
00113           if (m_deleted_column_family_timestamp < keyComps.timestamp)
00114             m_deleted_column_family_timestamp = keyComps.timestamp;
00115         }
00116         else {
00117           m_deleted_column_family.clear();
00118           m_deleted_column_family.ensure(len);
00119           memcpy(m_deleted_column_family.base, keyComps.row, len);
00120           m_deleted_column_family.ptr = m_deleted_column_family.base + len;
00121           m_deleted_column_family_timestamp = keyComps.timestamp;
00122           m_delete_present = true;
00123         }
00124         if (m_return_deletes)
00125           break;
00126       }
00127       else if (keyComps.flag == FLAG_DELETE_CELL) {
00128         len = (keyComps.column_qualifier - keyComps.row) + strlen(keyComps.column_qualifier) + 1;
00129         if (m_delete_present && m_deleted_cell.fill() == len && !memcmp(m_deleted_cell.base, keyComps.row, len)) {
00130           if (m_deleted_cell_timestamp < keyComps.timestamp)
00131             m_deleted_cell_timestamp = keyComps.timestamp;
00132         }
00133         else {
00134           m_deleted_cell.clear();
00135           m_deleted_cell.ensure(len);
00136           memcpy(m_deleted_cell.base, keyComps.row, len);
00137           m_deleted_cell.ptr = m_deleted_cell.base + len;
00138           m_deleted_cell_timestamp = keyComps.timestamp;
00139           m_delete_present = true;
00140         }
00141         if (m_return_deletes)
00142           break;
00143       }
00144       else {
00145         if (keyComps.timestamp >= m_end_timestamp)
00146           continue;
00147         if (!m_return_deletes && m_delete_present) {
00148           if (m_deleted_cell.fill() > 0) {
00149             len = (keyComps.column_qualifier - keyComps.row) + strlen(keyComps.column_qualifier) + 1;
00150             if (m_deleted_cell.fill() == len && !memcmp(m_deleted_cell.base, keyComps.row, len)) {
00151               if (keyComps.timestamp <= m_deleted_cell_timestamp)
00152                 continue;
00153               break;
00154             }
00155             m_deleted_cell.clear();
00156           }
00157           if (m_deleted_column_family.fill() > 0) {
00158             len = keyComps.column_qualifier - keyComps.row;
00159             if (m_deleted_column_family.fill() == len && !memcmp(m_deleted_column_family.base, keyComps.row, len)) {
00160               if (keyComps.timestamp <= m_deleted_column_family_timestamp)
00161                 continue;
00162               break;
00163             }
00164             m_deleted_column_family.clear();
00165           }
00166           if (m_deleted_row.fill() > 0) {
00167             len = strlen(keyComps.row) + 1;
00168             if (m_deleted_row.fill() == len && !memcmp(m_deleted_row.base, keyComps.row, len)) {
00169               if (keyComps.timestamp <= m_deleted_row_timestamp)
00170                 continue;
00171               break;
00172             }
00173             m_deleted_row.clear();
00174           }
00175           m_delete_present = false;
00176         }
00177         break;
00178       }
00179     }
00180 
00181     uint8_t *prev_key;
00182     size_t prev_key_len = sstate.key.decode_length(&prev_key);
00183 
00184     if (m_prev_key.fill() != 0) {
00185 
00186       if (m_row_limit) {
00187         if (strcmp(keyComps.row, (const char *)m_prev_key.base)) {
00188           m_row_count++;
00189           if (m_row_count >= m_row_limit) {
00190             m_done = true;
00191             return;
00192           }
00193           m_prev_key.set(prev_key, prev_key_len);
00194           m_cell_limit = m_scan_context_ptr->familyInfo[keyComps.column_family_code].max_versions;
00195           m_cell_cutoff = m_scan_context_ptr->familyInfo[keyComps.column_family_code].cutoffTime;
00196           m_cell_count = 0;
00197           return;
00198         }
00199       }
00200 
00201       if (prev_key_len == m_prev_key.fill() && prev_key_len > 9 && !memcmp(prev_key, m_prev_key.base, prev_key_len-9)) {
00202         if (m_cell_limit) {
00203           m_cell_count++;
00204           m_prev_key.set(prev_key, prev_key_len);
00205           if (m_cell_count >= m_cell_limit)
00206             continue;
00207         }
00208       }
00209       else {
00210         m_prev_key.set(prev_key, prev_key_len);
00211         m_cell_limit = m_scan_context_ptr->familyInfo[keyComps.column_family_code].max_versions;
00212         m_cell_cutoff = m_scan_context_ptr->familyInfo[keyComps.column_family_code].cutoffTime;
00213         m_cell_count = 0;
00214       }
00215 
00216     }
00217     else {
00218       m_prev_key.set(prev_key, prev_key_len);
00219       m_cell_limit = m_scan_context_ptr->familyInfo[keyComps.column_family_code].max_versions;
00220       m_cell_cutoff = m_scan_context_ptr->familyInfo[keyComps.column_family_code].cutoffTime;
00221       m_cell_count = 0;
00222     }
00223 
00224     break;
00225   }
00226   
00227 
00228 }

00232 bool MergeScanner::get(ByteString &key, ByteString &value) {
00233 
00234   if (!m_initialized)
00235     initialize();
00236 
00237   if (!m_queue.empty() && !m_done) {
00238     const ScannerStateT &sstate = m_queue.top();
00239     // check for row or cell limit
00240     key = sstate.key;
00241     value = sstate.value;
00242     return true;
00243   }
00244   return false;
00245 }

00248 
00249 void MergeScanner::initialize() {
00250   ScannerStateT sstate;
00251   while (!m_queue.empty())
00252     m_queue.pop();
00253   for (size_t i=0; i<m_scanners.size(); i++) {
00254     if (m_scanners[i]->get(sstate.key, sstate.value)) {
00255       sstate.scanner = m_scanners[i];
00256       m_queue.push(sstate);
00257     }
00258   }
00259   while (!m_queue.empty()) {
00260     sstate = m_queue.top();
00261     Key keyComps;
00262     if (!keyComps.load(sstate.key)) {
00263       assert(!"MergeScanner::initialize() - Problem decoding key!");
00264     }
00265 
00266     if (keyComps.timestamp < m_start_timestamp) {
00267       m_queue.pop();
00268       sstate.scanner->forward();
00269       if (sstate.scanner->get(sstate.key, sstate.value))
00270         m_queue.push(sstate);
00271       continue;
00272     }
00273 
00274     if (keyComps.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW) {
00275       size_t len = strlen(keyComps.row) + 1;
00276       m_deleted_row.clear();
00277       m_deleted_row.ensure(len);
00278       memcpy(m_deleted_row.base, keyComps.row, len);
00279       m_deleted_row.ptr = m_deleted_row.base + len;
00280       m_deleted_row_timestamp = keyComps.timestamp;
00281       m_delete_present = true;
00282       if (!m_return_deletes)
00283         forward();
00284     }
00285     else if (keyComps.flag == FLAG_DELETE_COLUMN_FAMILY) {
00286       size_t len = (keyComps.column_qualifier - keyComps.row) + strlen(keyComps.column_qualifier) + 1;
00287       m_deleted_column_family.clear();
00288       m_deleted_column_family.ensure(len);
00289       memcpy(m_deleted_column_family.base, keyComps.row, len);
00290       m_deleted_column_family.ptr = m_deleted_column_family.base + len;
00291       m_deleted_column_family_timestamp = keyComps.timestamp;
00292       m_delete_present = true;
00293       if (!m_return_deletes)
00294         forward();
00295     }
00296     else if (keyComps.flag == FLAG_DELETE_CELL) {
00297       size_t len = (keyComps.column_qualifier - keyComps.row) + strlen(keyComps.column_qualifier) + 1;
00298       m_deleted_cell.clear();
00299       m_deleted_cell.ensure(len);
00300       memcpy(m_deleted_cell.base, keyComps.row, len);
00301       m_deleted_cell.ptr = m_deleted_cell.base + len;
00302       m_deleted_cell_timestamp = keyComps.timestamp;
00303       m_delete_present = true;
00304       if (!m_return_deletes)
00305         forward();
00306     }
00307     else {
00308       if (keyComps.timestamp >= m_end_timestamp) {
00309         m_queue.pop();
00310         sstate.scanner->forward();
00311         if (sstate.scanner->get(sstate.key, sstate.value))
00312           m_queue.push(sstate);
00313         continue;
00314       }
00315       m_delete_present = false;
00316       uint8_t *ptr;
00317       size_t len = sstate.key.decode_length(&ptr);
00318       m_prev_key.set(ptr, len);
00319       m_cell_limit = m_scan_context_ptr->familyInfo[keyComps.column_family_code].max_versions;
00320       m_cell_cutoff = m_scan_context_ptr->familyInfo[keyComps.column_family_code].cutoffTime;
00321       m_cell_count = 0;
00322     }
00323     break;
00324   }
00325 
00326   m_initialized = true;
00327 }
